description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot)

panels.title: Dubbo Invoke 总体调用次数概览
Dubbo Invoke Errors 总体概览

targets.expr: sum(rate(dubbo_service_invoke_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", side="provider", result="suc", provider!="com.alibaba.dubbo.monitor.MonitorService"}[20s]))/sum(rate(dubbo_service_invoke_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", side="provider", result="suc", provider!="com.alibaba.dubbo.monitor.MonitorService"}[20s]))

sum(rate(dubbo_service_invoke_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", side="consumer", result="suc", provider!="com.alibaba.dubbo.monitor.MonitorService"}[20s]))/sum(rate(dubbo_service_invoke_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", side="consumer", result="suc", provider!="com.alibaba.dubbo.monitor.MonitorService"}[20s]))
